* Iron Raptor knew that P[rowl felt bad about letting his anger go like 
that, and she couldn't blaim him.
Just like his anger, it was her new body which had moved and struck out at 
Shadow instead of just waiting for Prowl to defeat him.
These new bodies seemed very unpradictable and she made it a chore to maybe 
get Iris to help her master it.
Suddenly Iron Raptor stopped in her tracks, remembering the computer program 
in the screen she almost left behind.
Her head tuened to see if she could locate the monotor when a voice suddenly 
came up in her head.
It wasn't Prow...it wasn't her mode...and it wasn't just a background 
thought.
It was........*

IRIS: < You stupid bitch! Just what do you think you're doing letting that 
featherhead push you around like that?!!>

* It was Iris.
But she wasn't in her main hard drive or anything...and she couldn't see the 
momotor anywhere either.
Then...where was she?
Iron Raptor growled as she turned on her heel a bit, seeing something off in 
the distance and zeroing in on it with her scanners.
Just as Prowl jogged up to her she finally saw just what it was....*

< I don't believe it....>

* Iron Raptor glanced towards Prowl for a moment, sending him an image of 
what she saw...it was another bot.
Sitting on a rotten stump only about 100 meters from where they stood now, 
female...and clad in armor.
Rather similar to the armor Iron Raptor wore...only it was read and had less 
of a build to it. A black cape flittering in the wind as the bot just sat 
there, resting it's arms on its knees and......looking right at them.
But then suddenly Iron Raptor heard laughter in her mind.*

IRIS: < Finally spotted me, huh? What do you think?>

* And with that the bot stood, obviously female...and obviously Iris.
But she just stood there, almost as if staring her down from the distance.
Now...THIS was new!
Obviously the merge didn't just have side effects on Iron Raptor and Prowl!*
